definitions.definition: One who has been perverted ; one who has turned to error , or adopted a twisted sense of values or morals .
A person whose sexual habits are not considered acceptable .
examples: Those perverts were trying to spy on us while we changed clothes!

main_definition: ( dated ) One who has been perverted ; one who has turned to error , or adopted a twisted sense of values or morals .
secondary_definitions: A person whose sexual habits are not considered acceptable .
